name: Slave of the Succubus
description:
You are a petty thief that owes money to a powerful crime boss. In desperation, you decide to rob a wizard's home for a tome that is purported to summon a succubus. The problem is that the tome is a trap and you end up enslaved by a succubus instead.

As the succubus' slave, she gives you a variety of orders, chiefly clearing her home of a monster infestation. The game features RPG elements and turn-based combats with a variety of spells that coincide to have additional effects. The game features no grinding or random encounters, focusing on unique, individual battles.

The house of a succubus is full of puzzles and prizes also. Solve a variety of puzzles to progress and explore, as well as earn loot to craft various equipment.

But that's not all. The succubus feeds on sexual energy and will be using you for that purpose. The game features numerous, uncensored NSFW scenes.
